issue.summary: insertion of a G causes a frameshift. Insert is represented by non-validated SNP rs3841258.
issue.description: A one base insertion of a G in the reference genome causes a frameshift in a novel putative coding gene. Insert is represented by non-validated SNP rs3841258.
issue.resolution_text: AMYH02035015.1 has been added to the reference tile path to aid representation of the common allelle

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC013759.6 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383567.1 created to capture sequence from AC013759.6 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383567.1 created to capture 7194 bp of sequence from AC013759.6 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC231988.2 and AC231982.2 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.resolution_text: FO681533.2 has been added to the TPF between AC231988.2 and AC231982.2 partially closing the gap and representing the part of the missing sequence variant, This gap closure will be pursued further in HG-1572

issue.summary: Gap between FP885917.2 and centromere
issue.status_text: Is the presence of centromeric repeat enough evidence to say the centromeric sequence has been reached
issue.description: Gap between FP885917.2 and centromere
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Gap between centromere and AC036178.11
issue.status_text: 24-JUN-13: CH17-429A22 is in active finishing 06-JAN-12: CH17-176B20 has been cancelled Accession for CH17-176B20: FP325316 Accession for CH17-429A22: FO681523
issue.description: Gap between centromere and AC036178.11. FO681523 has been added to the centromeric gap extending from AC036178.11
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Hsa18- TCEB3 problem region
issue.status_text: Confirmed there is more sequence between AC090373.11 and AC012254.12 and that join is incorrect; CH17-221O5 has now entered into finishing to resolve this. In GRCh38, a gap was inserted between components AC090373.11 and AC012254.12 to reflect the sequence that is missing from this region. For information on our continued work to resolve this gap, see HG-2304. 05-OCT-10: CH17-221O5 is in active finishing Accession for CH17-221O5: FP700187
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains a deletion within AC012254.12
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Three bases (TTA) missing from reference assembly in intron of DSC2
issue.description: Large scale sequencing/genotyping suggests that a 'TTA' sequence is missing from an intron (#7) of DSC2. (rs35717505)
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573685.1 addresses rs35717505 and has been added to the TPF for GRCh38.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the alternate reference chromosome between components AC231988.2 and AC231982.2
issue.status_text: FO681533 does not overlap AC231988.2 and so does not close gap
issue.description: There is a gap in the alternate reference chromosome between components AC231988.2 and AC231982.2
issue.resolution_text: FO681533.2 has been added to the TPF between AC231988.2 and AC231982.2 closing the gap

issue.summary: Assembly component AC139100.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.status_text: KC877689.1 and KC877687.1 only provide single base pair updates. This issue needs to be re-examined to determine what sequence was missing from GRCh37 and whether it has truly been captured for GRCh38.
issue.description: Assembly component AC139100.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: This missing sequence has been patched by KC877689.1 and KC877687.1 whole genome shotgun reads

issue.summary: Assembly component AC139100 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly"
issue.description: Assembly component AC139100 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly"
issue.resolution_text: switch point between AC090360 and AC139100 has been adjusted to represent the 1kG ph1 decoy that is absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC216001.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC216001.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC216001.4 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.resolution_text: This decoy has been captured and can be found in GRCh38 alternate reference component AC213028.5

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AP005431.3
issue.status_text: Optical map data and RP11 whole genome shotgun indicate this is indel variation not a clone problem
issue.description: Analysis of GU267005.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 18, suggest there may be ~3,771 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AP005431.3. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC048380.12
issue.description: Analysis of GU268657.1, GU268981.1 and GU268765.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 18, suggest there may be ~4,220 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC048380.12. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: The overlap between AC048380.12 and AC022919.8 has been adjusted to represent a 4.2kb insertion variant in AC022919.8 missing from Chr18 component AC048380.12 this has been added to the chromosome as a fix patch.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC109315.3
issue.status_text: This looks like varaition based on optical mapping and RP11 whole genome shotgun data
issue.description: Analysis of GU267577.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 18, suggest there may be ~1,139 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC109315.3. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: User Report: N bases in assembly component
issue.status_text: ABBA01013906 covers the region of Ns, so can be used to patch the reference genome
issue.description: A user has reported N bases at GRCh38 NC_000018.10: 80,253,367 and 80,253,375. The underlying component is AC139100.4, a clone from an unspecified YAC library. The GRC will look for a sequence that provides information at these two bases.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in chromosome 18 between components AC090373.11 and AC012254.12
issue.status_text: 05-OCT-10: CH17-221O5 is in active finishing Accession for CH17-221O5: FP700187
issue.description: There is a gap in chromosome 18 between components AC090373.11 and AC012254.12
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AP001086.7
issue.description: The possible misassembly/indel will be investigated
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC099849.4
issue.description: In progress
issue.resolution_text: The scaffold, AC221035.4 contains a ~5,694 bp insertion relative to GRCh38 chr.18 (NC_000018.10) representing novel sequence not in GRCh38

issue.summary: GeneID: 9658 (ZNF516), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_014643.2 (ZNF516) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The RP11-PCR (FP340564) supports the cDNA (NM_014643.2) across the region in question and has been added as a patch to correct the reference sequence

issue.summary: GeneID: 23556 (PIGN), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_176787.4 (PIGN) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The RP11-PCR (FP340563) supports the cDNA (NM_176787.4) across the region in question and has been added as a patch to correct the reference sequence

issue.summary: GeneID: 147339 (C18orf25), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_145055.3 (C18orf25) and the reference genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573673.1 addresses rs59370768 and has been added to the TPF for GRCh38. This fix means the reference sequence matches the gene.

issue.summary: GeneID: 374860 (ANKRD30B), order and orientation
issue.description: May not be appropriately joined due to similarities between chr18 and chr21, AF269088.1 is ANKRD30B on chr 18 and is only partially found in HuRef
issue.resolution_text:
There doesn't appear to be additional BACs missing either side of AL050302.2. The TPF looks good as it is:
AL049911 Hschr21_ctg1.1 AL050302 Hschr21_ctg1.1 AL078475 Hschr21_ctg1.1
The joins here are red and yellow on the TPF join page, but this is due to library variation. There is a lot of clone end data to suggest that these overlaps are real.

issue.summary: Chr.18 Component Gap Problem
issue.description: Sequence appears to be missing from within component AP005530.3.
issue.resolution_text: Ticket incorrectly generated due to out of date spreadsheet.

issue.summary: Chr.18 Component Gap Problem
issue.status_text: 26-OCT-12: WI2-2018D02 is in active finishing 09-JUL-14: ABC8-43009800C9 has entered the sequencing pipeline Accession for WI2-2018D02: FQ976899 Accession for ABC8-43009800C9: FO681534
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between component AC139100.4 and the telomere FQ976899.6 extends into the telomeric gap
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Unplaced component AC138661.2 may extend into assembly gap
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113947 may extend into assembly gap.
issue.resolution_text: AC138661.2 (XXfos-87120G11) removed from assembly

issue.summary: Chr. 18 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.status_text: The gap will be assessed to look for sequence extending past the current reference sequence
issue.description:
Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC090897.4 and AC091135.9.
New sequence has been added to this gap FP565789.2 and AEKP01020477.1 extend beyond AC090897.4 FP565802.6 and AEKP01020478.1 extends beyond AC091135.9 a gap still remains.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.18 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between the telomere and component AP005530.3
issue.resolution_text: Ticket created in error. No problem in this region. Clone ABC8-42999800H10 (RH) cancelled since it is unnecessary; component AP005530.3 contains telomeric sequence.

issue.summary: Chr. 18 Gap Problem Region #2
issue.status_text: RP11-1112M8 has been selected for sequencing 2012_06_28: RP11-1112M8 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for RP11-1112M8: FP565322 26-AUG-14: ABC16-925D20 has been cancelled
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC116904.7 and AC138660.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 18 Gap Problem Region #3
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC134978.4 and AC139070.3
issue.resolution_text: new accession FO704553.2 (ABC9-41287500C5) closes the gap between AC134978.4 and AC139070.3

issue.summary: GeneID: 1825 (DSC3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Questionable identity of NC_000018.9 nt 28,611,139 affects positioning of intron/exon boundary in NM_001941.3 (GeneID: 1825 (DSC3)).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF456361.1 addresses rs276936 and has been added to the TPF for GRCh38.

issue.summary: SERPINB11 transcript sequence disagrees with clone sequence
issue.description: NM_080475.2 differs by single bp in exon 3 (known SNP). GRCh37 contains the non-coding allele for SERPINB11 (rs4940595).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459701.1 addresses rs4940595 and is on the TPF for GRCh38.
